N'ime mkpụrụedemede ndị Finishia, akwụkwọ ozi ahụ nwere ike ịbụ na ọ sitere na hieroglyph maka ogwe aka nke na-anọchi anya pharyngeal fricative (/ ʕ/) n'asụsụ Egypt, mana ndị Semites degharịrị ya na /j/ (dị ka n'asụsụ Bekee "ee"), n'ihi na ha  okwu maka "ogwe aka" ji ụda ahụ malite
Enwere ike iji akwụkwọ ozi a nọchite anya /i/, ụdaume dị nso na-enweghị okirikiri, ọkachasị n'okwu mba ofesi
